question: Salaamualaikum. My Husbund is hot tempered. Sometimes he is assaults me physical also. Tell some dua to make to change his temper. jazakillah khair.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Pleasing the Husband

If one's husband is displeased with her for any reason whatsoever, she
should recite the following verse once and blow on any sweet dish. This
should then be given to him to eat. Insha Allah, his attitude will soon
change:

'Among people there are those who takes others besides Allah so equal with
Allah; they love them as they should love Allah. but those who believe are
stauncher in their love for Allah. Oh! That those who do evil would have but
known, (on the day of Qiyaamat) when they behold the doom, that power
belongs wholly to Allah, and that Allah is severe in punishment.' (Quraan -
Juz2 Rk.4)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
